title: The Shadow 1-15 + Annual + Special (2012-2013) [Dynamite] (Ongoi
description:
English | CBR and CBZ | 17 Issues

The Shadow #1-15 + Annual + Special
Publisher:  Dynamite Entertainment
Publication Date:  April 18, 2012 - July 3, 2013

Writers:  Garth Ennis, Victor Gischler, Chris Roberson, Tom Sniegoski, and Scott Beatty
Artists:  Aaron Campbell, Jack Herbert, Giovanni Timpano, Dennis Calero, and Ronan Cliquet
Colorists:  Carlos Lopez, Ivan Nunes, Fabricio Guerra, and Mat Lopes
Letterer:  Rob Steen
Cover Artists:  Alex Ross, Howard Chaykin, John Cassaday, Jae Lee, Ryan Sook, Stephen Segovia, Sean Chen, Francesco Francavilla, Darwyn Cooke, Mike Mayhew, Tim Bradstreet, Michael Golden, Jack Herbert, Paolo Rivera, and Jason Shawn Alexander

The Shadow is an ongoing series.

1938: The Shadow returns in a tale of blazing action and deadly intrigue, as a night of carnage on the New York waterfront plunges the mysterious vigilante into a conspiracy involving the fate of the world itself. As storm clouds gather across the globe, American Military Intelligence meets with a certain Lamont Cranston, determined to beat a host of spies and assassins to the greatest prize of all... but what that might be, only the Shadow knows.

Thanks goes to PhD, Fawkes, JK, Nahga, Darkness, GreenGiant, and Re-em for this release.
